spas.usercontrol

Class UserCourseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.usercontrol.UserCourseHandler

  • public class UserCourseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the course-saving and editing aspect of user database.
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti
